body.note:
If you want to use a different language for which there is no p-i18n-xx.css stylesheet, follow these instructions:
Copy one of the available stylesheets in your CSS customization (except the English one, it does not have the :lang pseudo-class as it is the default language)
For each rules, replace the :lang(xx) pseudo-class with your expected language code, then replace each property value with the expected label.
